system.description: Legend lore brings to your mind legends about a person, place, or thing. The spell can provide information about a notable subject. The information is usually in the form of a brief summary. The spell works like augury, with the same limits on the kinds of information you get. Casting requires 1d4x10 minutes of meditation.

components.materialDescription: Incense and rare oils worth 250 gp. Focus: four ivory strips (each worth 50 gp).
